mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mainpage_article2 (project_id, article_id, form_name, writeform2_title, writeform2_content, writeform2_latlng, writer, regDate, file_name, img_name) VALUES ( 1 ,article_seq.nextval , #{form_name}, #{writeform2_title}, #{writeform1_content}, #{writeform2_latlng}, 'tester', sysdate, #{file_name}, #{img_name})
